RootMetaData.description: This project is a non-commercial clone portfolio inspired by the 247 website. It recreates the experience of high-end billiard tables, ping-pong tables, and premium dumbbells to demonstrate luxury furniture-style UI and interactive web development skills using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. All rights to the original brand belong to the brand owner.

hero.lead: Crafting exclusive lifestyle products that inspire.
